translations: 柔软而会黏着的；难嚼的；有嚼劲的

sentences.sentence: Only then will it be possible to eat chewy white turkey.
sentences.translation: 只有这样，才可能吃到有嚼劲的白色的火鸡肉。

sentences.sentence: My starving soul nearly screamed with each voluptuous bite of silky roasted vegetables and chewy crust.
sentences.translation: 每次奢侈地咬一口柔滑的烤蔬菜和耐嚼的面包皮，我饥饿的灵魂都几乎尖叫。
